extendedInfo.description: Get streaming stock quotes on your phone.  Includes integrated stock symbol search, news feeds, advanced stock chart/details, multiple portfolios, and display sort options.  Fling the screen left or right to switch portfolios.Simple. Fast. The Best.-Issue with ^DJI date/time has been fixed in this release. -Updated to properly handle qHD screens.-Many crash/freeze fixes for issues in more recent versions of Android.

reviews.title: Old Quotes
reviews.comment: This morning, I got up and checking my quotes, freaked out. After my first cup of coffee, I realized Quote Pro was displaying old historic prices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fast and simple
reviews.comment: Simple but efficient and sleek. Does the job, and it\'s fast. Great for a quick check of my top stocks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Red is no good!
reviews.comment: Sucks when all you see is RED!  lol but great app! Simple, fast, easy to use,  real time update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for scottrade users
reviews.comment: One thing that would be great is ring tone notifications for stock prices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happend
reviews.comment: Quit working on .ok and .on stocks yesterday 5-30-12
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Works well, looks nice,
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.comment: Simple easy to use. Can make multiple list. Realtime refresh.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does Not Update
reviews.comment: I liked it well enough for awhile, but it has a tendency to NOT update the prices.  Even when I ask to refresh manually.  Not sure why, but without the update features, it\'s basically worthless.
reviews.author: Steve Owens

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Fast and easy quotes.  No frills... just what I needed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Howard Hutchison
reviews.comment: I dont get it!!!!  IT DONT DO ANYTHING!!!! I DONT THINK ANY OF TH\'ESE FREE APPS. DO ANYTHING , BUT THIS ONE WAS.THE WORST!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quotes not refreshed
reviews.comment: Suddenly shows 0.00 for many tickers even when yahoo finance keeps updating them.
reviews.author: Snowil Rebello

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: My only app I use to get quick updates on my stocks. However, it seems like it doesn\'t show stocks that are less than a penny. Please show more decimals for penny stocks for next update!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: Nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No OTC or pink
reviews.comment: Used to display penny stock prices but now thats gone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Argh
reviews.comment: This app always force closes the first time I try to open it and then works fine the second time.. I don\'t understand
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bare bones
reviews.comment: Nothing but quotes. No news, charts, comparisons. If all you want is quotes, it will do.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: Not terrible but there are much better apps out there.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problem with Nasdaq Quotes
reviews.comment: Quote Pro Nasdaq has not updated on my Droid Razr since 12/20/12. Has anyone else seen this?
reviews.author: Jim Whitfill

reviews.title: Wont slide.
reviews.comment: GalaxyS4 and it won\'t slide right between portfolios!!!
reviews.author: Maxi Miliano

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.comment: TOP , Superb and i like it... Thanks to dev
reviews.author: A Google User
